name: IntentTimelineProvider
desc: A type that advises WidgetKit when to update a user-configurable widgetâ€™s display.

items.name: func getSnapshot(for: Self.Intent, in: Self.Context, completion: (Self.Entry) -> Void)
items.desc: Provides a timeline entry representing the current time and state of a widget.

items.name: func getTimeline(for: Self.Intent, in: Self.Context, completion: (Timeline<Self.Entry>) -> Void)
items.desc: Provides an array of timeline entries for the current time and, optionally, any future times to update a widget.
